## Matrix4x4.lookAtCubeFace() method

Creates a matrix, which presents a transform of looking at given cube face.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static lookAtCubeFace(face: CubeFace, pos: Vector3, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```
